overview: Jerry Johnson inherits a 50,000 acre ranch. Lucky Miller wants to take over the ranch. Roy is trying to get a railroad spur right of way. Lucky has a woman come west to marry Jerry to get control of the ranch. After the wedding, Lucky has the owner killed. Royâ€™s gun is substituted for the murder weapon, so Roy is put in jail.
tagline: Hear Roy Sing: Springtime in the Rockies - Tumbling Tumbleweeds - and 4 other grand hits
title: Silver Spurs
